settings.text: © 2024, Built and using Eurus Theme. Powered by Shopify

settings.custom_liquid:
<script>
(events => {
  const loadScript = () => {
    events.forEach(type => window.removeEventListener(type, loadScript));
    clearTimeout(autoloadScript);

    const initScript = () => {
      function initFreshChat() {
        window.fcWidget.init({
          token: "63b4c80e-6420-42e4-ac23-0bb1c8f48f4d",
          host: "https://bsscommerce2.freshchat.com",
          widgetUuid: "ec869ef3-eff5-41b3-95d6-4170208d40f0"
        });
      }
      function initialize(i,t){var e;i.getElementById(t)?
      initFreshChat():((e=i.createElement("script")).id=t,e.async=!0,
      e.src="https://bsscommerce2.freshchat.com/js/widget.js",e.onload=initFreshChat,i.head.appendChild(e))}
      function initiateCall(){initialize(document,"Freshchat-js-sdk")}
      window.addEventListener?window.addEventListener("load",initiateCall,!1):
      window.attachEvent("load",initiateCall,!1);
    }

    if (window.requestIdleCallback) {
      requestIdleCallback(initScript);
    } else {
      requestAnimationFrame(initScript);
    }
  };

  let autoloadScript;
  const wait = window.innerWidth > 767 ? 2000 : 5000;
  events.forEach(type => window.addEventListener(type, loadScript, {once: true, passive: true}));
  autoloadScript = setTimeout(() => {
    loadScript();
  }, wait);
})(['touchstart', 'mouseover', 'wheel', 'scroll', 'keydown']);
</script>
<style>
.theme-template-article {
   --page-width: 1140px;

}
.theme-template-article blockquote {
  background-color: #f6f3f3;
    border-color: #02069f;
    border-left-width: 4px;
    padding: 15px;
    text-align: center;
}
.theme-template-article 
 blockquote>* {
   margin: 0;
}
</style>
